name: uiwis
description: UiWizard is a python-based ui-framework for the web. It was inspired by the great framework [NiceGui](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui). Why create this project that is very similar to NiceGui? - The first reason was that NiceGui requires websockets to work and when experimenting with the framework it caused some issues on my hosting platform. - Learning. I wanted to figure out how to do something simillar but without using websockets   - I wanted to try out HTMX - Limited control over the underlaying tech stack but mainly just learning
